response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000. Considering this and the cost of production and marketing, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $12,000. This price not only ensures a fair return for us but also provides you with significant savings compared to its perceived value. I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 12000}
